caption.p: Structural and morphological analysis of CH 3NH 3PbI 3−xCl x perovskite. ( a, b) XRD pattern and FE-SEM image of mixed halide perovskite sample (CH 3NH 3PbI 3−xCl x) and (inset a) shows the photograph of the homogenous perovskite precursor solution ( c) high resolution microscopic TEM image of CH 3NH 3PbI 3−xCl x perovskite and ( d) magnified HRTEM image with lattice fringes.
